duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute the highest quality and freshness standards and communicate to ensure standards are met.
Inspect and audit market products, providing effective peer-to-peer feedback on meat product quality standards.
Stock and rotate items in market cases, frozen food cases, shelves, and coolers.
Provide great customer service by ensuring the best quality, packaged, wrapped, and labeled product for the customer.
Organize and clean prep areas, freezers, coolers, wareroom, cases, and sales floor.
Comply with all federal, state, and company regulations and standards for product freshness, food safety, and sanitation.
Weigh, wrap, and use mandatory PLU codes to label/price packages.
Answer product-related questions and assist customers in making meat/seafood selections.

education_certification.credential: Successful completion of and certification from Meat Quality Control Expert Academy
